title: Gmail API List Labels Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the List Labels operation in Gmail API

labels.description: List of labels. Note that each label resource only contains an `id`, `name`, `messageListVisibility`, `labelListVisibility`, and `type`. The labels.get method can fetch additional label details.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
